segments.text: The kitchen looks busy with everyday chores.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman's at the sink area, holding a plate and towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet's running, filling the basin to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water overflows steadily onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's using the stool to access the upper cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookie jar's open, and he's taking some out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands nearby, reaching toward it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool seems unsteady under his weight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, there's a tidy garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are pulled back to let in light.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are stacked neatly on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a typical scene with a few surprises.
segments.speaker: PAR
